name: Skullcrusher
aura: Increases Ally RES in Faction Crypts by 45.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff if the target's DEF is lower than this Champion's.
skills.name: Smash
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +5%

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places a [Counterattack] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places an [Unkillable] buff on this Champion for 1 turn.
skills.name: Stonewall

skills.desc: Decreases the duration of all debuffs on this Champion by 1 turn at the start of each turn.
skills.name: Unshakeable [Passive]
